name: part_009
file: tmp_【#いろはにコラボ】祝！恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信！ [qgVPqPYGoTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: The three VTubers discuss the next challenge, mentioning the possibility of a faster speed for the dance.
They begin the 1.5x speed dance challenge for 'Hozuki Biyori'. Nakiri Ayame struggles and eventually gives up.
The replay of the dance challenge is shown as they react to their performance.
The results for the round are revealed, with Nakiri Ayame receiving an 'X' while Fubuki and Mio pass.
Nakiri Ayame is eliminated, leaving Fubuki and Mio to face the final round.
The final round of the dance challenge begins at a high speed. Both Fubuki and Mio struggle to keep up.
A replay of the final round is shown.
The members wait for the final judgment from the management staff.
The final results are announced, declaring Ookami Mio the winner with 7 points.

subtitles.original: お、意外といけちゃいましたね。
subtitles.english: Oh, we managed that surprisingly well.

subtitles.original: いけちゃいましたね。
subtitles.english: We really did.

subtitles.original: いやこれ問題は「鬼灯びより」ですよ。
subtitles.english: The real problem is 'Hozuki Biyori'.

subtitles.original: うわ、くるぞ。
subtitles.english: Oh man, it's coming.

subtitles.original: 「鬼灯びより」が1.5倍できちゃったらヤバいですよ。
subtitles.english: If 'Hozuki Biyori' comes at 1.5x speed, we're in trouble.

subtitles.original: やー、怖いですなー。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's scary.

subtitles.original: いやー、ヤバいよ。
subtitles.english: It's gonna be bad.

subtitles.original: ということで、じゃあ続いて1.5倍。
subtitles.english: So, moving on to 1.5x speed.

subtitles.original: はい。さあ、どの曲がくるか。どっちがくるか。
subtitles.english: Alright. Let's see which song it'll be. Which one will it be?

subtitles.original: どっちがくるか分からないマジで。
subtitles.english: I seriously have no idea which one is coming.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ行きましょう。準備いいですか？
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go. Are you ready?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: はい、いきますよ。ミュージック、スタート！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go. Music, start!

subtitles.original: （歌唱：鬼灯びより）
subtitles.english: (Singing: Hozuki Biyori)

subtitles.original: あ、間違えた！
subtitles.english: Ah, I messed up!

subtitles.original: あ、間違えたー！
subtitles.english: Ah, I messed up!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、待って！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute!

subtitles.original: もう間違えました、もう！
subtitles.english: I already messed it up!

subtitles.original: ということで、リプレイいきましょうか。リプレイ！
subtitles.english: Well, let's look at the replay. Replay!

subtitles.original: こちらです。結構いけてたんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Here it is. I think we did pretty well, didn't we?

subtitles.original: さあ、どうだ？
subtitles.english: Now, let's see.

subtitles.original: あ、ここ！ここ間違えた！
subtitles.english: Ah, here! I messed up here!

subtitles.original: いやー、これは完璧なのにミス！
subtitles.english: Man, it was perfect except for that mistake!

subtitles.original: さて、じゃあ運営さんの結果見ていきましょう！結果はこちら！
subtitles.english: Now, let's see the management's results! Here they are!

subtitles.original: うわー！あやめちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: しくじったー！マジでミス！
subtitles.english: I blew it! I seriously messed up!

subtitles.original: いやー、でもこれ思い切り清々しく間違えてましたね。
subtitles.english: Well, that was a very clear and obvious mistake.

subtitles.original: そうですね。今のあやめちゃん可愛かったぞ。
subtitles.english: True. But Ayame-chan was cute just now.

subtitles.original: これ難しかったよね。
subtitles.english: This was hard, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: いや、これないと足が、足がね！
subtitles.english: Yeah, without this, the legs, the legs!

subtitles.original: そう、足がね、わちゃわちゃしちゃうんですよ。
subtitles.english: Right, the legs just start flailing around.

subtitles.original: いや、これやばかったねー。焦りすぎて。
subtitles.english: Man, that was intense. I panicked too much.

subtitles.original: はい。ということで、なんか二人残っちゃったらしいので。
subtitles.english: Alright. So, it seems like two of us are left.

subtitles.original: 余は脱落です！え、ちょっと余さんは脱落ということで。
subtitles.english: I'm out! Wait, so I'm eliminated.

subtitles.original: お休みをいただきまして、私とミオで...
subtitles.english: I'll take a break, and it'll be me and Mio...

subtitles.original: え、最終決戦！頂上決戦！
subtitles.english: Wait, the final showdown! The battle for the top!

subtitles.original: ということで、どこで見てたらいいのかしら？
subtitles.english: So, where should I watch from?

subtitles.original: 余ちゃん真ん中座っとくかい？
subtitles.english: Want to sit in the middle, Yo-chan?

subtitles.original: え、座っていいのかしら？いいよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, am I allowed to sit there? Sure.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、私とミオで最後の決戦だ！
subtitles.english: Alright, it's the final showdown between me and Mio!

subtitles.original: 最後はまた1.5倍速ですかね、これ。見届けの時が。
subtitles.english: Is the last one going to be at 1.5x speed again? The time to witness it has come.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行きますか。倍速分かりませんが。
subtitles.english: Well, shall we? I don't know about the speed, though.

subtitles.original: やってみよう。ミュージック、スタート！
subtitles.english: Let's try it. Music, start!

subtitles.original: （歌唱：鬼灯びより）
subtitles.english: (Singing: Hozuki Biyori)

subtitles.original: うわー！これきたかも！
subtitles.english: Whoa! This might be it!

subtitles.original: 負けたかも！リプレイを、お願いします！
subtitles.english: I might have lost! Replay, please!

subtitles.original: 最後やっちゃったかもー。
subtitles.english: I might have messed up at the end.

subtitles.original: おおー！これ結構接戦じゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Oh! Isn't this a pretty close call?

subtitles.original: そうですね。さあどうかな。
subtitles.english: It is. Now, let's see.

subtitles.original: 運営さんの結果見ていきましょう。あ、もう少し待ってくださいね。
subtitles.english: Let's see the management's results. Oh, please wait a little longer.

subtitles.original: でも結構接戦だったんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: But it was quite a close battle, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: どうかなー。間違えちゃったー。
subtitles.english: I wonder. I made a mistake.

subtitles.original: 今のところ巻き返してきたフブキさん、どうだ？
subtitles.english: Fubuki-san, who has been catching up, how did she do?

subtitles.original: 結構危ういんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it pretty risky?

subtitles.original: 一番最下位ですからね、今得点が。じゃあ行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Since I'm in last place score-wise right now. Okay, let's go!

subtitles.original: 運営さんの結果はこちら！
subtitles.english: Management's results are here!

subtitles.original: いよっしゃー！待って、何で余がバツなん？
subtitles.english: Hell yeah! Wait, why did I get an X?

subtitles.original: 何で真ん中バツなの、誰でもいいよー！
subtitles.english: Why is the middle an X? Anyone would have worked!

subtitles.original: やったー！「鬼灯びより」なら勝てたのになー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Man, if only it was 'Hozuki Biyori', I would've won!

subtitles.original: おめでとうミオちゃん！やったー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations, Mio-chan! Yay!

subtitles.original: まさかの大逆転かもしれない！
subtitles.english: This might be an incredible comeback!

subtitles.original: 点数集計を今運営さんにお願いして...
subtitles.english: We're asking management to tally the scores now...

subtitles.original: 合計の、カルタの分もあって。なるほどね。
subtitles.english: The total, including the karuta portion. I see.

subtitles.original: でも今回あれだね、鬼畜もなくてよかったね。
subtitles.english: But it's good there was no 'brutal' mode this time.

subtitles.original: やばいよあれ、1.5倍くると。
subtitles.english: That would've been insane at 1.5x speed.

subtitles.original: ということで、結果きましたので。
subtitles.english: Alright, the results are in.

subtitles.original: さあ、最終結果はこちらです！
subtitles.english: Now, here are the final results!

subtitles.original: わー！ミオが7点！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Mio has 7 points!
